THAILAND

Antoinette Hall
April 2017

My junior year in high school I had the opportunity to join a mission trip to Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand. A group of 20 students and 4 teachers went to Ubon Adventist International Mission School to help them build a cafeteria. For 10 days, we laid concrete and held a Vacation Bible School for the children in the nearby village. Some of the students were also teachers' assistants because some of the foreign teachers were on a visa run. It was a very enjoyable experience.

April 2018

Senior year we went back to the same school in Thailand and helped them prepare for the opening of their new school building. We painted the walls and a mural near the playground. Again we had Vacation Bible School but this time we did it with the children in the school. Besides working, we went on a boat ride down the border of Thailand and Laos.
